definition: Lee Teng-hui (1923-2020), Taiwanese politician, president of ROC 1988-2000
gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)

sentences.english: When the sun is bright, the whole room is in a perfect blaze of splendor, as its windows are mainly east.
sentences.chinese: 陽光燦爛是整個房間四壁皆輝，因爲窗戶大多朝東。

sentences.english: With good stability and high output, Huihong Machinery are recognized and favored by the industry.
sentences.chinese: 輝鋐機器穩定性佳，產量高，深受業界的認同與愛戴。

sentences.english: Hui and Rong fell in love with each other. His lower body became completely paralyzed.
sentences.chinese: 輝和蓉相親相愛，但自從輝受傷後，下半身完全癱瘓。

sentences.english: So I don't have any opinions to persuade Rong stay on Hui's side to care him.
sentences.chinese: 因此我沒有多的理由來說服容留下來照顧輝。

sentences.english: The status of his grandfather Zhao Hui s was eminent.
sentences.chinese: 其祖父趙輝也曾地位顯赫。

sentences.english: Hui is so lucky to have a nice wife Rong with a kind heart.
sentences.chinese: 輝很幸運，可以找到這麼一個心地善良的好妻子蓉。

definition: pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist

to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
